subject: Re: [junit] Junit logger
msgSnippet: Hello, I have a similar request. I want to log the Junit assertion messages with log4j. Is there a way to do this? I execute my tests with ant:
messageBody:
Hello,

I have a similar request.
I want to log the Junit assertion messages with log4j. Is there a way to
do this?

I execute my tests with ant:

<junit fork="no" haltonfailure="true" printsummary="withOutAndErr">
<test name="${testclass}"
todir="${test.last}/${openbravo.context}/${test.log}" />
<formatter type="xml" />
<classpath>
<path refid="test.classpath" />
</classpath>
</junit>

pura vida.
--
